body_html:
The code worked no problem with TF 0.10.1 + Cuda 7.5 + Cudnn 4.
I didn't upgrade to TF 1.0 hence cannot try it immediately.

The code that occasionally cause the freezing problem is very similar to the TF seq2seq example.
https://github.com/TellinaTool/learning_module/blob/master/encoder_decoder/framework.py

I'm not sure if it's possible to pin-point at which line it freezes.

The issue also happens quite non-deterministically.

body:
The code worked no problem with TF 0.10.1 + Cuda 7.5 + Cudnn 4. 
I didn't upgrade to TF 1.0 hence cannot try it immediately.

The code that occasionally cause the freezing problem is very similar to the TF seq2seq example.
https://github.com/TellinaTool/learning_module/blob/master/encoder_decoder/framework.py

I'm not sure if it's possible to pin-point at which line it freezes.

The issue also happens quite non-deterministically.
